melvorF:Spiked_Shell_Ring.name: Spiked Shell Ring

Gain -${onHitEffect0modValue0}s Attack Interval,-${onHitEffect0modValue1}% Global Accuracy and -${onHitEffect0modValue2}% Maximum Hit each time you succesfully hit, stacking up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times. Spirit Power.description: (MAGIC ONLY) Perform an attack dealing your normal damage plus an additional ${attackDamageMaxValue1} damage. On a hit has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply stun for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn. Consumes 3 Spirit Runes per attack.

Flurry.description: Attack ${hitCount} times for ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage (avoidable). Gain +${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Maximum Hit each time you succesfully hit, stacking up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times. Stacks reset on a miss.

Ice Prison.description: Unavoidable attack that applies freeze for ${onHitEffect0turns} turns.

Crushing Blow.description: Perform an unavoidable attack that does ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit multiplied by your current hitpoints percent damage.

Infernum.description: Perform ${hitCount} unavoidable attacks that deal ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of normal damage on the 1st attack, ${attackDamageMaxValue1}% of normal damage on the 2nd attack, and ${attackDamageMaxValue2}% of normal damage on the 3rd attack.

melvorItA:Fear_Hunter_Whip.name: Fear Hunter Whip
melvorItA:Fear_Hunter_Whip.description: +30% Maximum Hit when the enemy has less than 50% Current Hitpoints

Dual Lashes.description: Perform ${hitCount} avoidable attacks that deal ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage over ${duration}s. On a hit, gives you -${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Attack Interval and +${onHitEffect0modValue1}% Maximum Hit for ${onHitEffect0turns} of your turns and has a ${onHitEffect1chance}% chance to apply Fear for ${onHitEffect1turns} turn

melvorItA:Fear_Gem.name: Fear Gem
melvorItA:Fear_Gem.description: +1% chance to apply Fear when hitting with an attack per Attack Turn, stacking up to 10 times. Stacks reset to 0 at maximum stacks.

Shadow Blaze 420.description: An avoidable attack that deals up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, inflicts Ablaze that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s and gives the enemy -${onHitEffect1modValue0}% Global Evasion for ${onHitEffect1turns} of your turns.

Open Wounds.description: An avoidable attack that deals up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, inflicts ${onHitEffect0stacks} stacks of Laceration and inflicts Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect1DamageMaxValue0}% of the damage dealt as damage over ${onHitEffect1duration}s. Laceration deals damage equal to ${onHitEffect0percent}% of your max hit per stack (Stacks up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times) every ${onHitEffect0interval}s.

Malevolent Blight.description: An avoidable attack that deals up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. Gives you +${preHitEffect0modValue0}% Toxin lifesteal for ${preHitEffect0turns} of your turns. On a hit, inflicts Blight and inflicts Toxin that deals ${onHitEffect1DamageMaxValue0}% of your base max hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect1duration}s.

melvorItA:Silencing_Gemstone.name: Silencing Gemstone
melvorItA:Silencing_Gemstone.description: +1% chance to apply Silence when hitting with an attack per Attack Turn, stacking up to 10 times. Stacks reset to 0 at maximum stacks.

melvorItA:Netherite_Gloves.name: Netherite Gloves
melvorItA:Netherite_Gloves.description: Passive: +3% Maximum Hitpoints and +3% Abyssal Resistance if using Melee against Magic, Ranged against Melee or Magic against Ranged

Eldritch Curse.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit as damage. On a hit, inflicts Eldritch Curse which disables the enemy's lifesteal and hitpoint regeneration for ${onHitEffect0turns} of their turns.

melvorItA:Void_Gem.name: Void Gem
melvorItA:Void_Gem.description: +2% chance to apply Voidburst when hitting with an attack per Attack Turn, stacking up to 10 times. Stacks reset to 0 at maximum stacks.

melvorItA:Deep_Wounds_Consumable_I.name: Deep Wounds Consumable I
melvorItA:Deep_Wounds_Consumable_I.description: +10% Bleed lifesteal, +15% chance to ignore Bleed and enemies take 10% more damage from Bleed. One item is consumed per player attack.

melvorItA:Deep_Wounds_Consumable_II.name: Deep Wounds Consumable II
melvorItA:Deep_Wounds_Consumable_II.description: +20% Bleed lifesteal, +30% chance to ignore Bleed and enemies take 20% more damage from Bleed. One item is consumed per player attack.

melvorItA:Deep_Wounds_Consumable_III.name: Deep Wounds Consumable III
melvorItA:Deep_Wounds_Consumable_III.description: +40% Bleed lifesteal, +60% chance to ignore Bleed and enemies take 40% more damage from Bleed. One item is consumed per player attack.

melvorItA:Blighted_Enhancement_1.name: Blighted Enhancement 1
melvorItA:Blighted_Enhancement_1.description: Gives the Enemy: +10% Damage taken from Laceration

melvorItA:Blighted_Enhancement_1_Augment.name: Blighted Enhancement 1 (Augmented)
melvorItA:Blighted_Enhancement_1_Augment.description: Gives the Enemy: +20% Damage taken from Laceration

melvorItA:Blighted_Enhancement_Superior.name: Blighted Enhancement (Superior)
melvorItA:Blighted_Enhancement_Superior.description: +6% Food healing value while using Normal Damage, +60% Food healing value while using Abyssal Damage, +2 additional quantity of primary resource gained in Harvesting (Cannot be doubled), +2% Lifesteal per attack turn (Stacks up to 5 times), and Gives the Enemy: +20% Damage taken from Laceration

melvorItA:Abyssal_XP_Scroll_of_Productio.name: Abyssal XP Scroll of Production
melvorItA:Abyssal_XP_Scroll_of_Productio.description: +3% Abyssal XP for Cooking, Smithing, Fletching, Crafting, Runecrafting, Herblore & Summoning.

melvorItA:Abyssal_XP_Scroll_of_Gathering.name: Abyssal XP Scroll of Gathering
melvorItA:Abyssal_XP_Scroll_of_Gathering.description: +3% Abyssal XP for Woodcutting, Fishing, Firemaking, Mining, Thieving, Agility, Astrology & Harvesting.

melvorItA:Enhanced_Gathering_Scroll.name: Enhanced Gathering Scroll
melvorItA:Enhanced_Gathering_Scroll.description: +1 additional quantity of primary resource gained in Woodcutting, Fishing, Mining, Astrology & Harvesting for Abyssal Realm only (Cannot be doubled).

melvorItA:Enhanced_Production_Scroll.name: Enhanced Production Scroll
melvorItA:Enhanced_Production_Scroll.description: +1 additional primary resource gained in Cooking, Smithing, Fletching, Crafting, Runecrafting and Herblore

melvorItA:Abyssal_Fletching_Scroll.name: Abyssal Fletching Scroll
melvorItA:Abyssal_Fletching_Scroll.description: +1 additional quantity of primary resource gained in Fletching for Abyssal Arrows, Abyssal Bolts and Abyssal Javelins only (Cannot be doubled) and -10% chance to preserve resources in Fletching.

melvorItA:Abyssal_Mining_Gloves.name: Abyssal Mining Gloves
melvorItA:Abyssal_Mining_Gloves.description: Until depleted: +4% Mining Abyssal XP, -15% Mining node respawn interval for Abyssal Realm only, +40% chance to gain +1 additional resource in Mining for Abyssal Realm only (Cannot be doubled).

melvorItA:Abyssal_Smithing_Gloves.name: Abyssal Smithing Gloves
melvorItA:Abyssal_Smithing_Gloves.description: Until depleted: +4% Smithing Abyssal XP, +50% chance to gain +1 additional resource in Smithing for Abyssal Bars (Cannot be doubled).

melvorItA:Abyssal_Firemaking_Gloves.name: Abyssal Firemaking Gloves
melvorItA:Abyssal_Firemaking_Gloves.description: Until depleted: +4% Firemaking Abyssal XP, +1 additional quantity of primary resource gained in Firemaking for Abyssal Realm only (cannot be doubled).

melvorItA:Abyssal_Harvesting_Gloves.name: Abyssal Harvesting Gloves
melvorItA:Abyssal_Harvesting_Gloves.description: Until depleted: +4% Harvesting Abyssal XP, -3% Harvesting Skill Interval, +1 intensity per action in Harvesting.

melvorItA:Abyssal_Fletching_Gloves.name: Abyssal Fletching Gloves
melvorItA:Abyssal_Fletching_Gloves.description: Until depleted: +4% Fletching Abyssal XP, -0.2s Fletching Skill Interval for Abyssal Realm only, -5% cost to produce items in Fletching for Abyssal Realm only.

melvorItA:Abyssal_Crafting_Gloves.name: Abyssal Crafting Gloves
melvorItA:Abyssal_Crafting_Gloves.description: Until depleted: +4% Crafting Abyssal XP, -5% cost to produce items in Crafting for Abyssal Realm only, +5 additional quantity of Abyssal Consumables gained in Crafting (Cannot be doubled).

melvorItA:Abyssal_Herblore_Gloves.name: Abyssal Herblore Gloves
melvorItA:Abyssal_Herblore_Gloves.description: Until depleted: +4% Herblore Abyssal XP, -5% cost to produce items in Herblore Abyssal Realm only, +10% chance to receive a Random Tier of the same Potion in Herblore for Abyssal Realm only.

melvorItA:Abyssal_Runecrafting_Gloves.name: Abyssal Runecrafting Gloves
melvorItA:Abyssal_Runecrafting_Gloves.description: Until depleted: +4% Runecrafting Abyssal XP, -5% Runecrafting Skill Interval for Abyssal Realm only, +1 additional quantity of Abyssal Runes & Abyssal Combination Runes gained in Runecrafting (Cannot be doubled).

melvorItA:Bobs_Lost_Rake.name: Bob's Lost Rake
melvorItA:Bobs_Lost_Rake.description:
+50% Chance to preserve any type of Compost applied to Farming Plots when harvesting. +5% Farming Yield.
When equipped with Bob's Lost Gloves: +25% Chance to preserve any type of Compost applied to Farming Plots when harvesting. +15% Farming Yield.

melvorItA:Bobs_Lost_Gloves.name: Bob's Lost Gloves
melvorItA:Bobs_Lost_Gloves.description:
+4% Farming Yield.
When equipped with Bob's Lost Rake: +25% Chance to preserve any type of Compost applied to Farming Plots when harvesting. +15% Farming Yield.

melvorItA:Cape_of_Completion_ItA.name: Cape of Completion (Into the Abyss)
melvorItA:Cape_of_Completion_ItA.description: A token for completing Into the Abyss.

melvorItA:Eternity_Sword_Uncharged.description: While equipped, disables ability to gain Combat Skill XP & Abyssal XP

Large Lightning Strike.description: A large lightning bolt erupts from your sword dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply stun for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn. Avoidable

Large Thunder Strike.description: You call down a powerful thunder strike on the enemy dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage. On a hit, applies stun for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn. Unavoidable.

Torrential Blast.description: You fire a bolt that transforms into a torrent of water dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. Unavoidable.

melvorTotH:Royal_Toxins_Spear.name: Royal Toxins Spear
melvorTotH:Royal_Toxins_Spear.description: While the Target is both Poisoned and Bleeding, +40% of Maximum Hit added to Minimum Hit and -40% Attack Interval.

Piercing Toxic Strike.description: You jab the enemy with your poison tipped spear dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Poison that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's max hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s; a ${onHitEffect1chance}% chance to inflict Deadly Poison that deals ${onHitEffect1DamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's max hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect1duration}s and inflicts Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect2DamageMaxValue0}% of the damage dealt as damage over ${onHitEffect2duration}s. Avoidable.

melvorTotH:Ethereal_Longbow.name: Ethereal Longbow
melvorTotH:Ethereal_Longbow.description:
Target Damage Reduction is decreased by flat 10% and +30% Ammo Preservation.
When equipped with Ethereal Arrows: Target Damage Reduction is decreased by flat 5%

Ethereal Arrows.description: You conjure shimmering ethereal arrows and fire them at the enemy, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, gives the enemy -${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Damage Reduction that stacks up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times. Unavoidable.

Spinning Axe.description: You swing your axe around in a circle slashing through everything it hits, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the damage dealt as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s. Unavoidable.

Feather Storm.description: You fire ${hitCount} avoidable razor sharp feathers at the enemy, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage on the 1st attack, ${attackDamageMaxValue1}% of your normal damage on the 2nd attack, ${attackDamageMaxValue2}% of your normal damage on the 3rd attack, and ${attackDamageMaxValue3}% of your normal damage on the 4th attack. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the damage dealt as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s.

Agile Wings.description: You aim at weak points and unleash a powerful combination attack, performing ${hitCount} avoidable strikes that deal ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage on the 1st attack, ${attackDamageMaxValue1}% of your normal damage on the 2nd attack, and ${attackDamageMaxValue2}% of your normal damage on the 3rd attack. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the damage dealt as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s.

melvorTotH:Slicing_Maelstrom_Wand.name: Slicing Maelstrom Wand
melvorTotH:Slicing_Maelstrom_Wand.description: Grants access to Slicing Maelstrom Archaic Spell

Bad Throw.description: You throw out the grappling hook and miss, hooking a rock instead of the enemy. Deals no damage.

Good Throw.description: You throw out the grappling hook and wrap it around the enemy, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage. Unavoidable.

Killshot.description: An unavoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit.

Hunter Precision.description: An unavoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit.

Darksteel Stab.description: On a hit inflicts Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the damage dealt as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s.

Gloom Doubleshot.description: (RANGED ONLY) An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply Fear for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn.

Withering Barrage.description: (RANGED ONLY) Perform ${hitCount} avoidable attacks that deal ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Wither which gives the enemy -${onHitEffect0modValue0}% ${onHitEffect0modResistanceName0} and -${onHitEffect0modValue1}% Global Evasion that stacks up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times until the end of the fight

Nether Drowsing Bolt.description: (RANGED ONLY) Perform ${hitCount} avoidable attacks that deal ${attackDamageMinValue0}% of your min hit to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply sleep for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn

Lacerate.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage. On a hit, inflicts ${onHitEffect0stacks} stacks of Laceration. Laceration deals damage equal to ${onHitEffect0percent}% of your max hit per stack (Stacks up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times) every ${onHitEffect0interval}s.

Toxic Blast.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit as damage. On a hit, inflicts Toxin that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of your base max hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s.

Blighted Feathers.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, inflicts Blight and inflicts Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect1DamageMaxValue0}% of the damage dealt as damage over ${onHitEffect1duration}s. Blight gives -${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Maximum Hit,-${onHitEffect0modValue1}% Global Accuracy,-${onHitEffect0modValue2}% Global Evasion every ${onHitEffect0interval}s (Stacks up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times, removed at max stacks).

Shadow Attack.description: Perform a regular attack. Gives you +${preHitEffect0modValue0}% Global critical hit chance for ${preHitEffect0turns} of your turns.

Wither Spores.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, inflicts Wither which gives the enemy -${onHitEffect0modValue0-0}% ${onHitEffect0modResistanceName0-0} and +${onHitEffect0modValue1}% Global Evasion that stacks up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times until the end of the fight and applies sleep for ${onHitEffect1turns} turn.

Stinging Silence.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit as damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, inflicts Toxin that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of your base max hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s and inflicts Silence, which prevents the enemy from performing special attacks for ${onHitEffect1turns} of the enemy's turns.

Eldritch Curse.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit as damage. On a hit, inflicts Eldritch Curse which disables the enemy's lifesteal and hitpoint regeneration for ${onHitEffect0turns} of their turns.

Hollow Nightmare.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit as damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply sleep for ${onHitEffect0turns} turns and gives the enemy -${onHitEffect1modValue0}% Maximum Hit for ${onHitEffect1turns} of the enemy's turns.

Voidburst Barrage.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, inflicts ${onHitEffect0stacks} stack of Voidburst. Voidburst stacks up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times. Upon reaching maximum stacks, they take damage equal to ${onHitEffect0percent}% of your base max hit.

Mark of the Void.description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, inflicts ${onHitEffect0stacks} stack of Voidburst. Voidburst stacks up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times. Upon reaching maximum stacks, they take damage equal to ${onHitEffect0percent}% of your base max hit.

Malevolent Blight.description: An avoidable attack that deals up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. Gives you +${preHitEffect0modValue0}% Toxin lifesteal for ${preHitEffect0turns} of your turns. On a hit, inflicts Blight and inflicts Toxin that deals ${onHitEffect1DamageMaxValue0}% of your base max hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect1duration}s.
